name: Bug Join
description:
Bug Join! Instructions:

Using your mouse, left-click to select and highlight 3+ matching pieces to join the bugs! The more bugs you join together, the higher the score multiplier!

Comments:

This game is currently in development for both iPhone and browser. I have a few plans for the game development process and where I want to take the project from here, but for now, I wanted something to upload that was working and fun enough to play with! 

In the comments, post your high score and what map size you did! Please also leave any comments if you find any immediate bugs! Cheers

Credits:

Game Engine: Unity 2020.3.25f1 / C#
Game Art: Aseprite
Game Design/Programming: Garnet Kane
